item.description: Here's the good map for the area: http://www.leominster-ma.gov/pdf/geocaching-maps-2009/lh_monoosnoc_middle.pdf If there's a problem with that, if you google monoosnock trail middle section you can download the pdf. This hike connects with the Monoosnock Trail, a 10 mile ridge trail in Leominster, of all places.

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: South Monoosnock Hike
